response.original_title: Raphaël aux Francofolies de La Rochelle
response.overview: A regular at the Francofolies, Raphaël, the authentic French songwriter, visited La Rochelle last July to perform on stage his greatest songs and the titles of his ninth album, Haute Fidelity. This latest opus, raw and airy, rock and melancholic, is the result of a happy collaboration with several artists, including the singer Pomme (Le Train du soir), Clara Luciani (Si tu pars, ne dit rien), Arthur Teboul from group Fire! Chatterton (La Jetée), Valeria Bruni Tedeschi (Blue Makeup).
response.title: Raphaël aux Francofolies de La Rochelle
